name: Peacock
title: The Mechanical Menace
subtitle: A trigger-happy inventor who combines gunplay with mechanical ingenuity
lore: Peacock is a brilliant but eccentric inventor who has augmented herself with various mechanical devices. Her arsenal includes rapid-fire guns, time-manipulating traps, and her faithful robotic companion. Despite her playful demeanor, she's a formidable opponent who can control the battlefield with her array of gadgets.

Q.name: Rapid Shots
Q.description: Peacock fires 5 shots in the targeted direction, dealing [50%/55%/70%/90%/100%/125% AD] damage.

W.name: Time Trap
W.description: Peacock throws a trap at the designated nearby location. If an enemy steps on it, they take [200%] increased damage from Peacock and are rooted for [1.2s]. The traps last for [120s].

E.name: Clockwork Clobber
E.description: Peacock swings a hammer in the targeted direction, dealing [50/130/250/350/450/560] damage to hit enemies and knocking them back. If a trap is within the knockback range, enemies automatically fall into it.

R.name: Robodog
R.description: Peacock sends her robotic dog after the designated enemy, which chases them until it makes contact. Upon contact, it slows the target for [2.5s] and deals [300/445/600/795] damage. The robotic dog can be destroyed with [3/3/5/5] autoattacks before reaching its target. Only one charge can be used on the same target.

1.name: Precision Shots
1.description: Q ability is transformed. Fires 3 shots instead of 5, but they automatically hit the target.

1.name: Extra Trap
1.description: W ability gains a second charge.

5.name: Swift Shooter
5.description: Autoattacks increase Movement Speed by [10%] for [3s], stackable up to [3 times].

5.name: True Sight
5.description: Peacock can see nearby invisible enemies.

5.name: Weapon Upgrade
5.description: Peacock gains an additional [+25] AD, and at Level 20, it increases to [+50]].

10.name: Unstoppable Robodog
10.description: Robodog cannot be destroyed and moves faster.

15.name: Piercing Shots
15.description: Q ability damages and passes through minions.

15.name: Trap Synergy
15.description: After using W, Peacock's Q ability deals [15%] more damage.

20.name: Emergency Protocol
20.description: Using an item instantly restores 47% missing HP with a [75s] cooldown.

20.name: Long Range Specialist
20.description: Rapid Shots deal [20%] more damage to distant enemies.

20.name: Clockwork Revolution
20.description: Clockwork Clobber affects enemies around Peacock, not just in front, and the cooldown is reduced by [3s].

20.name: Stun Module
20.description: Using an item with 2 charges, Peacock's next autoattack stuns for [0.7s] with a [50s] cooldown.
